snippet: Sgt. William Flores was sued in the 2009 death of Mauricio Jaquez in the Bronx.
abstract: New York City Police Sgt William Flores is cleared by federal jury in Manhattan of claims he violated civil rights of Mauricio Jaquez of Bronx in 2009; emotionally disturbed man died after being shot by Flores during response to domestic violence call.
lead_paragraph: Sgt. William Flores was sued in the 2009 death of Mauricio Jaquez in the Bronx.

headline.main: Jury Clears New York Police Sergeant in Fatal Shooting

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Flores, William (New York, NY, Police Officer)
